TITLE: Over 60 million tax returns could be completed automatically, study shows
SUMMARY: The IRS could automate over 60 million tax returns, saving filers time and money, according to a study.

TITLE: Don't follow this 'popular belief' when planning for early retirement, says former JPMorgan portfolio manager
SUMMARY: How much should you save for early retirement? JPMorgan Chase's former head of retirement solutions shares the popular myth that holds young people back from a happy, stress-free early retirement.

TITLE: 'Financial First Aid' author: Don't feel 'guilty or ashamed' about making money mistakes
SUMMARY: Alyssa Davies recommends strategies than can get you out of financial trouble and alleviate anxiety about money along the way.

TITLE: F1 CEO sees 'great opportunity' in TV rights talks with ESPN deal due to expire
SUMMARY: The racing league's current deal with ESPN expires at the end of 2022.

TITLE: Kevin O'Leary doesn't hire 'workaholics': 'Working 25 hours a day makes you very, very unproductive'
SUMMARY: O'Leary tells CNBC Make It that when he's reviewing a pile of resumes, the last thing he wants to see is someone who spends all their time focused on work.

TITLE: Fiji seizes $300 million superyacht belonging to Russian oligarch Suleiman Kerimov
SUMMARY: The seizure of Suleiman Kerimov's superyacht is part of a broader effort to take the assets of sanctioned oligarchs as Russia invades Ukraine.

TITLE: Why Elon Musk doesn't like to follow business plans: 'These things are always wrong'
SUMMARY: Elon Musk stopped making business plans after selling his web software company Zip2 to Compaq for $307 million in 1999. Here's why.

TITLE: More wealthy investors would rather hold or add stocks than sell if markets keep sliding, survey says
SUMMARY: Wealthy investors are more likely to add to their stock holdings or shift out of certain sectors rather than sell if stocks continue to decline.

TITLE: This 35-year-old turned her eBay side hustle into a $141 million company: 'Here's the business plan I used'
SUMMARY: In 2014, Tori Gerbig quit her $35,000-per-year job to grow her e-commerce side hustle, Pink Lily. Today, she runs the $141 million company full-time with her husband. The 35-year-old entrepreneur shares the simple five-step business plan she used.

TITLE: Here’s how much cash retirees need to weather a stock market downturn
SUMMARY: With high inflation and rising interest rates, many worry about a prolonged stock market downturn. Here's how much cash retirees need to prepare.

TITLE: Miami hosts its first F1 Grand Prix this weekend, and thousands of fans are spending a ton just to be in town
SUMMARY: Miami's top hotels, restaurants and night clubs are offering high-priced packages for race-goers.

TITLE: Here’s where I bonds may work in your portfolio, according to financial advisors
SUMMARY: I bonds are currently paying 9.62% annual interest through October, which is an opportunity for a range of goals, according to financial experts.

TITLE: Getting an inheritance or winning the lottery can create serious emotional and financial challenges
SUMMARY: Coming into sudden wealth can create emotional and financial challenges for people who have not had a lot of money in their lives.

TITLE: Op-ed: Money decisions by women will shape the future for the U.S.
SUMMARY: As women begin to control ever more of household assets in the U.S., financial services firms must adapt to find betters ways to meet female clients' needs.

TITLE: What's the best hotel for business travel? Take CNBC's survey and tell us your favorite
SUMMARY: If you feel strongly about what makes a hotel great for business trips — and we're betting you do — then now's the time to weigh in.

TITLE: Why solo female travelers are joining group tours
SUMMARY: Solo travel is typically associated with flexibility, and group tours are seen as rigid. So why are female solo travelers signing up for this style of travel?

TITLE: Greenwich estate owner will accept bitcoin or Ethereum cryptocurrency as payment for $6.5 million property
SUMMARY: The agent for the Greenwich property said it is the first time a Greenwich residence could be sold for cryptocurrency like bitcoin or Ethereum.

TITLE: Nearly risk-free I bonds to deliver a record 9.62% interest for the next six months
SUMMARY: Inflation-protected I bonds, a nearly risk-free asset, will pay 9.62% annual interest for the next six months. Here’s what to know before buying.

TITLE: Four tips for managing an unexpected increase in money
SUMMARY: Kristen Heaton sold her $15 million hairbrush brand Crave Naturals for seven figures. Here's her advice for how to manage new wealth and get the most out of it.

TITLE: Most Americans still feel optimistic about retirement. But inflation is hurting some workers’ confidence
SUMMARY: Despite the pandemic, most Americans still feel optimistic about retirement, a survery finds. But inflation is a top concern for those who aren't prepared.

TITLE: Mark Cuban says TikTok is 'the future of sports media' — here's why
SUMMARY: Mark Cuban says TikTok's AI algorithms tailor its suggestions to both short attention spans and users' personal interests — making it a perfect fit for sports.

TITLE: Elon Musk will be the most indebted CEO in America if the Twitter deal goes through
SUMMARY: Because Musk's wealth is largely tied up in Tesla stock, he will have to sell millions of his shares and pledge millions more to raise the necessary cash.

TITLE: Powerball's $473.1 million jackpot has a winner. Here's the tax bill
SUMMARY: Regardless of whether the winner chooses an annuity over time or as a reduced cash amount, federal and state taxes will take a big bite out of the windfall.

TITLE: Fool yourself into being good with money using 4 mental hacks from doctors and CEOs
SUMMARY: Sticking to a budget and spending less may be easier if you employ mental tricks that can help you "fool" your brain into being more responsible with money.

TITLE: Americans view these Asian countries as safer now than before the pandemic
SUMMARY: Travelers say they feel safer in South Korea, Singapore, Thailand, Japan, China and Vietnam, according to a 2022 report by Berkshire Hathaway Travel Protection.

TITLE: Warren Buffett's charity lunch auction is back – and it's your last chance to bid on a meal with the billionaire investor
SUMMARY: After a two-year hiatus due to the Covid-19 pandemic, Warren Buffett is auctioning off a lunch with himself — billed as the "grand finale" of the annual event.

TITLE: Real estate inventory plummets in South Florida, but the luxury markets are hotter than ever
SUMMARY: South Florida's real estate inventory has declined rapidly over the past five years, but luxury homes are selling for bigger sums than ever before.

TITLE: Here's what to do first if you win Powerball's $454 million jackpot
SUMMARY: In between daydreaming about winning such a huge amount, it's worth giving thought to the steps you should take right away if you do manage to hit the jackpot.

TITLE: Want a 720 credit score? Here are four ways to improve yours
SUMMARY: Your credit score is a metric that financial institutions and other lenders use to evaluate how responsible you have been at borrowing money.

TITLE: Why Elon Musk has Jack Dorsey's 'trust' to run Twitter—a look back at their friendship
SUMMARY: Twitter founder Jack Dorsey says he trusts Elon Musk to run Twitter – but it isn't the first time he's expressed admiration for the world's richest man.
